update.name: MiXplorer v4.6.4 (201405261)
update.log:
v4.6.4: - Added opening zip files everywhere as fast as possible. - Most of features are improved and optimized. - Fixed a lot of bugs.
v4.5.2: - Fixed root problems. - Fixed Google drive issues. - Changed drag-drop files dialog. - Fixed auto rename packages. - Fixed sending files from categories. - And some other tiny bugs and changes.
v4.5.0: - Added Select "Only files" and "Items between" options to selection popup. - Added Shredder option to destroy files before deleting them. - Reordered TLS cipher suites for secure connections. - Removed locking folders, we only have startup lock. - Added selecting items from multiple tabs. - Added drag-drop items between tabs. - Fixed some UI problems. - Fixed some clouds problems. - Added Meo Cloud. - Removed MegaCloud and Ubuntu-one. - Added EncFS (Volume root folder must ends with .encfs). - Fixed lots of tiny bugs.
